Package com.mygdx.gigabiteconomy.screens

Class PlotScreen

java.lang.Object
com.mygdx.gigabiteconomy.screens.PlotScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
Direct Known Subclasses:
LevelOnePlotScreen, LevelThreePlotScreen, LevelTwoPlotScreen
public class PlotScreen
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
Abstract class which all level plot screens inherit from

      Parameters:
      body - String name, used in directory, to transition to level screen
